news.title: Harvey reportedly raising at $11B valuation just months after it hit $8B
news.summary: After announcing $190 million in ARR in December, Harvey may be raising again a big leap in valuation.

news.title: Workday CEO Eschenbach departs, with co-founder Aneel Bhusri returning as CEO
news.summary: Bhusri said in a statement that the company's next chapter would be focused on AI.

news.title: Lyft opens its ride-hailing app to teens
news.summary: Rival Uber started allowing teens to use the app two years ago.

news.title: Hacked, leaked, exposed: Why you should never use stalkerware apps
news.summary: According to TechCrunch’s ongoing tally, including the most recent data spill involving uMobix, there have been at least 27 stalkerware companies since 2017 that are known to have been hacked, or leaked customer and victims’ data online.

news.title: Anthropic closes in on $20B round
news.summary: The company raised $13 billion in equity funding just five months ago, but intense competition between frontier labs and the ongoing cost of compute have made them eager to raise as quickly as possible.

news.title: AI-generated ads dropped the ball at this year’s Super Bowl
news.summary: It feels like everyone who produced ad spots for this year's Super Bowl with generative AI failed in terms of making gen AI seem useful or like something worth getting excited about. news.title: Ferrari’s first EV will have an interior designed by Jony Ive
news.summary: Ferrari released the first interior images of the company's first all-electric supercar, called the Ferrari Luce ("light" in Italian). news.title: Google’s Pixel 9A is back down to $349, its cheapest price so far
news.summary: The Pixel 9A is an incredible phone that’s worth hopping on while it’s $349 for the 128GB version in blue, black, or pink at Amazon and Best Buy. news.title: Leaked specs for Sony’s next flagship wireless earbuds reveal ANC upgrades
news.summary: Following images of Sony's new WF-1000XM6 earbuds shared by a retailer last week ahead of an official announcement, reliable leaker billbil-kun has revealed what they're claiming are the full specs and new features of the company's next flagship buds. news.title: Linux 6.19 arrives with a teaser for Linux 7.0
news.summary: On Sunday, Linux developer Linus Torvalds announced the release of Linux 6.19, which will be the last update in this kernel cycle, as previously reported by Phoronix. news.title: Soundcore Aerofit 2 Pro Review: Open Earbuds With ANC?
news.summary: The design of Soundcore’s latest open earbuds magically transforms them into noise-canceling buds. But does it actually work?

news.title: No Company Has Admitted to Replacing Workers With AI in New York
news.summary: New York state has required companies to disclose if “technological innovation or automation” was the cause of job loss for nearly a year. So far, none has.

news.title: AI Is Here to Replace Nuclear Treaties. Scared Yet?
news.summary: The last major nuclear arms treaty between the US and Russia just expired. Some experts believe a combination of satellite surveillance, AI, and human reviewers can take its place. Others, not so much.
